translations: 系统地；合乎科学地；学问上

sentences.sentence: Efforts are being made to research it scientifically.
sentences.translation: 正在努力对它进行科学研究。

sentences.sentence: The parts of the enterprise which are scientifically the most exciting are unlikely to be militarily useful. I am thinking here of the development of new kinds of lasers.
sentences.translation: 这份计划中，从科学角度看最让人兴奋的部分在军事上却可能无用。我指的是新型激光开发。

sentences.sentence: Please tell people how to deal with the rubbish scientifically.
sentences.translation: 请告诉人们如何科学地处理垃圾。
